casebody.data:
Barbara DAHLE
v.
The STOP AND SHOP SUPERMARKET COMPANY, LLC, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 5, 2018

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 185 Conn.App. 71, 196 A.3d 862 (2018), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
